Texts.Chs: 某人对于一根法杖的描述，或许这只是恶作剧。
Texts.Eng: A rather droll text all about one particular staff. It's quite ridiculous.

Texts.Chs: [第八百五十四页]然后我利用远古之书、两根密文魔杖和远古神器组合而成的这把法杖消灭了我的敌人，这把武器是多么的奇特，它让我所向披靡。
Texts.Eng: [page 854] - And then it was that I at long last assembled it from the Elder Tome, Rune Wand and Elder Artifact. My enemies shook in terror, for the staff I held was capable of might untold! I was invincible! And hungry. Popcorn? Yes. That seemed a reasonable...
